hero.name: Gustavo Julião
hero.description: Software developer with extensive experience in Python, Node, and PHP, creating robust solutions for automation, data analysis, web development, and decentralized applications. Focused on delivering projects that exceed expectations, using best practices and modern technologies.

services.title: My Services
services.webDevelopmentDesc: Development of modern and responsive web applications. Creation of RESTful APIs and integration with databases. Specialized in technologies like Django, Vue.js, Laravel, Python, Node.js, Flutter, WEB3.0
services.mobileDevelopmentDesc: Experience in the mobile application development cycle with Flutter, from conception to publication.
services.technicalSkillsDesc: Skills in AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure Servers. Using Linux, Docker, and Kubernetes for container orchestration. And integration with AI, TELEGRAM, WHATSAPP, DISCORD APIs.
services.automationToolsDesc: Solid knowledge in web interaction automation, DOM manipulation, and cross-browser test execution with Playwright and Selenium libraries.

skillsSection.aboutMeDesc: Developer with programming experience, focused on delivering efficient and well-structured solutions. Experience in projects with modern technologies, with emphasis on front-end (Vue, Flutter) and back-end (Python/Django). Proactive, with an analytical profile and committed to quality and deadlines. Always seeking to learn and apply good development practices.

projectsSection.project1Desc: Vue.js platform that integrates with the Provider, facilitating contract generation
projectsSection.project2Desc: Application for bill payments, support, WIFI configuration
projectsSection.project3Desc: Computer Vision for Eye Temperature Detection
